meanings.definition: A substance used to kill mollusks.
meanings.sent1: The farmer sprayed molluscicide on the garden to protect the plants.
meanings.sent2: The environmentalist recommended using molluscicide to control the snail population.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous snail dared his friends to swim in the molluscicide pond.
meanings.sent4: The molluscicide worked like magic, turning the garden into a snail-free zone.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue color of the molluscicide made it easy to spot in the field.

meanings.definition: The act of using a substance to kill mollusks.
meanings.sent1: The molluscicide application was scheduled for early morning to avoid harming other creatures.
meanings.sent2: After the heavy rain, the molluscicide was washed away, requiring a second treatment.
meanings.sent3: The detective suspected foul play when he found traces of molluscicide near the pond.
meanings.sent4: The molluscicide operation was a success, with no snails left in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The volunteers worked together to spread the molluscicide evenly across the field.
